member.summary: Gets or sets the repetition of table header. By enabling this property, will repeat the table header on every page break. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.HtmlConverter.HtmlConverter.EnableRepeatTableFooter
member.summary: Gets or sets the repetition of table footer. By enabling this property, will repeat the table footer on every page break. The default value is false.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to There is already one outstanding '{0}' call for this WebSocket instance. ReceiveAsync and SendAsync can be called simultaneously, but at most one outstanding operation for each of them is allowed at the same time..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The argument must be a value greater than {0}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The close status description '{0}' is too long. The UTF8-representation of the status description must not be longer than {1} bytes..
